mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_member(club_id, member_id, grade, approved, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{clubId}, #{memberId}, #{grade}, #{approved}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT id, club_id, member_id, grade, approved, created_at, updated_at FROM club_member WHERE club_id = #{clubId} AND approved = 1
SELECT id, club_id, member_id, grade, approved, created_at, updated_at FROM club_member WHERE club_id = #{clubId} AND approved = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE club_member SET approved = 1, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{id}
